actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-999.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 11400 to authorize the appropriation of specified dollar amounts for each of the National Science Foundation's major program areas (and certain subprograms), and to provide requirements relating to periods of availability and transfers of the authorized funds.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H. R. 11400 (National Science Foundation's major program authorizations).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 11400 to authorize the appropriation of specified dollar amounts for each of the National Science Foundation's major program areas (and certain subprograms), and to provide requirements relating to periods of availability and transfers of the authorized funds.
